DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate three new investigational tablet formulation Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) approve medication Prempro™ , Premarin combine medroxyprogesterone acetate ( MPA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study 3 New Formulations Premarin/MPA Compared With Premarin/MPA ( Prempro )
DOC.criteria: Healthy , postmenopausal woman , age 35 70 year Spontaneous amenorrhea least 12 month ( FSH require ) spontaneous amenorrhea least 6 month ( FSH level ≥38 mIU/mL ) ; spontaneous amenorrhea must begin age 55 BMI range 18 35 kg/m2 History presence hypertension ( > 139 mm Hg systolic > 89 mm Hg diastolic ) History drug allergy conjugate estrogen ( CE ) selective estrogen receptor modulators ( SERMs ) Use prescription investigatioanl drug within 30 day test article administration
